description: If January’s Cold Moon succeeded in reminding us of what season we’re in, February’s upcoming full moon has another apt moniker: Snow Moon. description: The federal industry minister is calling for a review of Ottawa’s “business relationship” with Amazon after the company said it will close all seven of its warehouses in Quebec. “They’ll have me fighting to make sure that this is not going to go unanswered in Canada,” Industry Minister François-Philippe Champagne said.
